content.text: Debit order is the most convenient way to pay your Woolies account.
To set up a debit order, call us on 0861 50 20 20 or e-mail queries@wfs.co.za with the subject line: Debit order

debitOrder.subtitle: Please also send us the following:

content.text: Debit order amount: (this can be either full payment, minimum payment, fixed amount or fixed percentage)

footer.text: Note: If you are setting up a debit order for a Woolies Personal Loan, remember to also attach a clear copy of your valid SA Identity Document (if its an ID card include both sides).
